description: This file defines a React component named CompletionModal which presents a modal dialog overlay when a puzzle is completed. It includes utility functions for DOM manipulation and rendering logic for the modal overlay with event handlers.

methods.name: getOrCreateOverlayRoot()
methods.description: Ensures a single overlay root element exists in the document for React portals; creates it if not present.

methods.name: CompletionModal({ open, seconds, onClose, onPlayAgain })
methods.description: React functional component that displays a modal dialog with completion info and action buttons, rendered via React portal.

ctags.name: CompletionModal
ctags.pattern: /^export default function CompletionModal({ open, seconds, onClose, onPlayAgain }) {$/
